fields.name: lblrheader
fields.fieldText: {!lbl_header}

fields.name: rsec1
fields.fieldText:
PROJECT STATUS

Project Status: {!Lst_Project_Status}


Status Comment: {!txtstatuscomment}


Foreseeable Challenges: {!txt_Foreseeable_Challenges}

fields.name: reviewfinance
fields.fieldText:
Expenses: {!txtexpenses}


Funding: {!txtFunding}


Partner Expected Funding: {!pcsExpected}

fields.name: lblexpectedexplaination
fields.fieldText: Explanation of Expected Funding:{!txt_Partner_Contribution_Sales}

fields.name: displayltp
fields.fieldText:
LTP Specific Entries


Book in Progress: {!txt_Book_s_Currently_Working_On}


Book Most Recently Completed: {!txt_Most_Recent_Book_Completed}


Sample Passage (Local): {!txt_Passage_Sample_Local}


Sample Passage (English):

{!txt_Passage_Sample_English}

fields.name: displaylmp
fields.fieldText:
LMP STATISTICS


Print Delivery: {!num_Print_Delivery}


Web Delivery: {!Num_Web_Delivery}


Epub\PDF Deliver: {!num_ePub_PDF_Delivery}


Social Media Delivery:

{!num_Social_Media_Delivery}


﻿Audio Delivery: {!Num_Audio_Delivery}

fields.name: displaylmp2
fields.fieldText:
﻿


Device Delivery (Audio, Video, Digital): {!Num_Device_Delivery}


Video Delivery: {!Num_Video_Delivery}


Email Delivery: {!Num_email}


App Delivery: {!Num_App_Delivery}

fields.name: displaynar
fields.fieldText: Explanation of Numbers or Testimony: {!Narrative}

fields.name: displayprayerrequest
fields.fieldText:
Prayer Request: {!Txt_Prayer_Request}


If correct, please click next to proceed. If edits need to be made please click previous until the needed screen is reached.

fields.name: lblnumheader
fields.fieldText: {!lbl_header}

fields.name: num_Print_Delivery
fields.fieldText: Print Delivery -- # of people directly using those resources. It can be higher than your print number. Please use narrative section on the next screen to explain. Actual print distribution numbers are calculated within your project Resource Orders. Enter a 0 if N/A

fields.name: Num_Web_Delivery
fields.fieldText: Web Delivery -- # of unique users. Enter a 0 if N/A

fields.name: num_ePub_PDF_Delivery
fields.fieldText: ePub/PDF Delivery -- # of files/downloads/clicks. Enter a 0 if N/A

fields.name: num_Social_Media_Delivery
fields.fieldText: Social Media Delivery -- # of post engagements. Enter a 0 if N/A

fields.name: Num_Audio_Delivery
fields.fieldText: Audio Delivery -- # of listeners. Enter a 0 if N/A

fields.name: Num_Device_Delivery
fields.fieldText: Device Delivery (Audio, Video, Digital) --# of people using devices. Enter a 0 if N/A

fields.name: Num_Video_Delivery
fields.fieldText: Video Delivery -- # of views. Enter a 0 if N/A

fields.name: Num_email
fields.fieldText: Email Delivery -- # of opens/click through rate. Enter a 0 if N/A

fields.name: Num_App_Delivery
fields.fieldText: App Delivery -- # of downloads. Enter a 0 if N/A

fields.name: scrintro
fields.fieldText:
Project Type: {!radiorecordtypeid}


Project Region: {!csregion}


Please select your project - month and year of report

fields.name: lstProject
fields.fieldText: Project

fields.name: lblnote_month
fields.fieldText: NOTE: Impact Numbers are only recorded on Quarterly Reports. If you have numbers to report please select a Quarterly Month – Dec, Mar, Jun, Oct

fields.name: Lst_Report_Month
fields.fieldText: Report Month

fields.name: Fiscal_Year_2_digit
fields.fieldText: Fiscal Year (2 digit)

fields.name: lblnarrativeheader
fields.fieldText: {!lbl_header}

fields.name: Narrative
fields.fieldText: What is the context around these mobilization numbers? How and to whom were these resources deployed? Can you share a story or testimony of impact from a recipient of this resource? How has their life changed? How is the local church/partner using this resource?

screens.description: This screen is used to specifically gather LTP Book Info
screens.name: SCRN_Language_Translation_Project
screens.label: LTP - Book Information

fields.name: lblheadltp1
fields.fieldText: {!lbl_header}

fields.name: txt_Most_Recent_Book_Completed
fields.fieldText: Most Recent Book Completed

fields.name: txt_Book_s_Currently_Working_On
fields.fieldText: Book(s) Currently Working On?

fields.name: lblsuccess
fields.fieldText:
Your record has been saved!


Please upload any supporting documentation:

fields.name: lblltphead2
fields.fieldText: {!lbl_header}

fields.name: txt_Story_Update_Notes
fields.fieldText: What is something significant about this translation happened recently, give context to your activities…I live in…, I’ve been working on this team…on this project since.., this translation is needed why…) Can do written/video interviews but add link.

fields.name: txt_Passage_Sample_Local
fields.fieldText: Passage Sample (Local)

fields.name: txt_Passage_Sample_English
fields.fieldText: Passage Sample (English)

fields.name: lblprayerheader
fields.fieldText: {!lbl_header}

fields.name: Txt_Prayer_Request
fields.fieldText: Prayer Requests:

screens.description: Which record type is being inputed
screens.name: scrrecordtype
screens.label: Record Type Selection

fields.name: lstRegion
fields.fieldText: Region

fields.name: radiorecordtypeid
fields.fieldText: Select Project Type

fields.name: sectmonthyear
fields.fieldText:
Project: {!lstProject}


Region: {!lstRegion}


Report Month: {!pcsmonths}


﻿Fiscal Year: {!Fiscal_Year_2_digit} (2 digit year)

fields.name: Lst_Project_Status
fields.fieldText: Reported Project Status

fields.name: txtstatuscomment
fields.fieldText: If the project is on hold or stopped, why? What is the plan for resuming\ending\revising the project? If progressing, what has been done over the last month?

fields.name: chkchallenge
fields.fieldText: Are there any foreseeable challenges with this project?

fields.name: txt_Foreseeable_Challenges
fields.fieldText: Please detail the foreseeable challenges

screens.description: The final few fields in the top section of the update
screens.name: scrtopendupdate
screens.label: Project Expense Screen

fields.name: lbl_header
fields.fieldText: {!sectmonthyear}

fields.name: radioexpenses
fields.fieldText: Do you have any Expenses, funding or Sales to Report on?

fields.name: txtexpenses
fields.fieldText: Have you spent any money on this project this month? If so, please enter the amount here

fields.name: txtFunding
fields.fieldText: If more or full funding for this project were immediately available, could you expedite this project forward?

fields.name: pcsexpartner
fields.fieldText: Are there any partner contributions or sales expected with this project?

fields.name: txt_Partner_Contribution_Sales
fields.fieldText: If Yes, when and how much?

variables.description: Store the record type of project (LMP, LTP etc)
variables.name: VarRecordTypeId
